message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I believe it would be very valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to pay $20,000 for the product. Considering its value to me, I think $15,000 would be the most I could afford. What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective on the value. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with $16,000. This feels like a fair compromise given the value of the product to me.
